page.title: 05IRCHESTER SUMMER FETE
page.content: The Summer Fete is held in June each year, at the Sports Field.It is a very popular event in Irchester.Gala princesses from surrounding villages meet.Before the events on the field a procession parades through the village. Many families enter the fancy dress competition - some win prizes.As the parade enters the field it meets many colourful stalls. The princesses are judged to find the Â£Gala Rose' and then the races begin. Children and adults join in the fun. Refreshments are on sale.Money raised at the Tombola stalls and in the competitions is given to help the village in some way. The day is a success for all the family especially if the sun shines!
